lines: My name is Orel Zilberman. I am a passionate programmer with a BSc. in Software Engineer (Since 2018).
I have experience in multiple platforms, ranging from Web to native Android and iOS mobile development and a touch of cross platform (React Native).
I love to explore new topics and to learn as much as I can.
Recently I became a Udemy fan with a 3 certificates (and counting) (Swift+Swiftui,60hrs, Machine Learning 43hrs, Cyber Security part 1 13hrs).
I am an active developer with critical thinking. I take part in discussions about the future of the development and say what I think.
I am a good team player and a solo one as well. I have a proven passion for challenges and learning and I am not afraid of hard work.
I am highly dedicated to what it is I am doing and I keep in tune with new developments.
You will find high level summaries of my experience/education in my resume.
In my github you will find projects that will give you a sense of the technologies that I have worked with.
